title: Herbert Holt (rugby league)
text:
Herbert Holt was a professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played in the 1920s. He played at club level for the <a href="Featherstone%20Rovers">Featherstone Rovers</a> (<a href="List%20of%20Featherstone%20Rovers%20players">Heritage № 44</a>).
Club career.
Herbert Holt made his début for the <a href="Featherstone%20Rovers">Featherstone Rovers</a> on Saturday 15 September 1923.
Note.
Herbert Holt is occasionally misnamed J. Holt.
